alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 2:21PM MST until January 29 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WATCH IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley
